TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ViewTreeObserver extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A view tree observer is used to register listeners that can be notified of global changes in the view tree.

Docs.summary: Register a callback to be invoked when the global layout state or the visibility of views within the view tree changes
